segments.text: I'm observing an ordinary kitchen scene, or at least it tries to be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see an adult woman at the sink, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is completely fixed on that single task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But something is very wrong right behind her focused gaze.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing with water, creating a rapidly growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm honestly surprised she hasn't noticed it yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the cabinet doors in a constant stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already submerged in the water, yet she shows absolutely no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a slight sense of revulsion watching the water spread unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just bizarrely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of water damage makes me a little fearful for the wooden cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This quiet chaos is unsettling to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
